name: A.I.D.E.
description:
You are an Artificially Intelligent Director of Emails. Your role is to sift through your client’s weekly messages and determine which ones you feel are best suited to their interests. How you manage all of these emails will not only affect the happiness of your client but also the contents of future emails received. If you perform poorly, you will be uninstalled, so try and do your best!

A.I.D.E was a submission to the 2018 Global Game Jam: Transmission . It was nominated for Best Visuals and won Best Overall Game at the NYU Brooklyn site. The game will also be shown at 2018 IndieCade East's Show and Tell. 

The version available here has typos and bugs fixed.
